name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】STARt IN THE SCREEEN!【#星街すいせい50万人記念ライブ】 [JNmmnB4bP0M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'PLATONIC GIRL' by Hoshimachi Suisei and Tokoyami Towa.

subtitles.original:
PLATONIC GIRL
作詞・作曲：みきとP
subtitles.english:
PLATONIC GIRL
Lyrics & Composition: Mikito-P

subtitles.original: Don't touch me.
subtitles.english: Don't touch me.

subtitles.original: ついてこられるか この正真
subtitles.english: Can you keep up with this reality?

subtitles.original: 仇なんて おまけにすぎないよ
subtitles.english: Resentment is nothing more than a bonus.

subtitles.original: 目で見るリアルがすべてじゃない
subtitles.english: The reality you see isn't everything.

subtitles.original: 平気に sick for you
subtitles.english: Unfazed, I'm sick for you.

subtitles.original: 触れたい欲望 触れない愛情
subtitles.english: Desire to touch, love that can't touch.

subtitles.original: この距離 about 10 millimeter
subtitles.english: This distance is about 10 millimeters.

subtitles.original: 薄い薄い膜を隔てて
subtitles.english: Separated by a thin, thin membrane.

subtitles.original: 俺が愛だと叫んでみせても
subtitles.english: Even if I shout that I am love,

subtitles.original: NO WAY 狼なんで
subtitles.english: NO WAY, because I'm a wolf.

subtitles.original: NO WHAT? あの赤ずきん
subtitles.english: NO WHAT? That Little Red Riding Hood.

subtitles.original: TAKE ME 限界地帯に突入
subtitles.english: TAKE ME, entering the limit zone.

subtitles.original: 甘くなくても溶けていくのさ
subtitles.english: Even if it's not sweet, I'll melt away.

subtitles.original: CRUSH ON YOU BABY!
subtitles.english: CRUSH ON YOU BABY!

subtitles.original: プラトニックな プラトニックな エンドレス・ラブ
subtitles.english: Platonic, platonic endless love.

subtitles.original: 触れないで 抱き合って テンダネス・ラブ
subtitles.english: Don't touch me, hold me tight, tenderness love.

subtitles.original: ツミサケ GIVE ME MORE (GIVE ME MORE)
subtitles.english: Shout of sin, GIVE ME MORE (GIVE ME MORE).

subtitles.original: ドキドキして致死量
subtitles.english: Pounding heart, a lethal dose.

subtitles.original: 関節的 ありえない I LOVE YOU
subtitles.english: Indirectly, an impossible I LOVE YOU.

subtitles.original: BUT DON'T TOUCH ME
subtitles.english: BUT DON'T TOUCH ME

subtitles.original: ここから先は立ち入り禁止
subtitles.english: No entry beyond this point.

subtitles.original: 甘い果実に手を伸ばさないで
subtitles.english: Don't reach out for the sweet fruit.

subtitles.original: 毒でいい子にお座りなさい
subtitles.english: Sit down like a good boy with this poison.

subtitles.original: NO WAY IN A WINK FOR YOU
subtitles.english: NO WAY IN A WINK FOR YOU

subtitles.original: 醒めない衝動 禁断症状
subtitles.english: Unawakening impulse, withdrawal symptoms.

subtitles.original: この距離 about 1 millimeter
subtitles.english: This distance is about 1 millimeter.

subtitles.original: 切ない切ない際どい関係
subtitles.english: A painful, painful, risky relationship.

subtitles.original: パンドラの箱 詰まっているのは
subtitles.english: What's stuffed inside Pandora's box is,

subtitles.original: NO WAY 底知れない友情
subtitles.english: NO WAY, bottomless friendship.

subtitles.original: NO WHAT? ハードオリオン
subtitles.english: NO WHAT? Hard Orion.

subtitles.original: KISS ME 見たいならどうぞ
subtitles.english: KISS ME, if you want to see, then go ahead.

subtitles.original: 希望の先に残ったものは
subtitles.english: What's left at the end of hope is,

subtitles.original: TAKE ONE MORE MY LOVE!
subtitles.english: TAKE ONE MORE MY LOVE!

subtitles.original: プラトニックな プラトニックな エンドレス・ラブ
subtitles.english: Platonic, platonic endless love.

subtitles.original: シラケないで 遊ばせて テンダネス・ラブ
subtitles.english: Don't spoil the fun, let me play, tenderness love.

subtitles.original: だから BE QUIET (QUIET) QUIET (QUIET)
subtitles.english: So BE QUIET (QUIET) QUIET (QUIET),

subtitles.original: 見つめ合っているだけ
subtitles.english: We're just staring at each other.

subtitles.original: 完璧さ これ以上 求めないで
subtitles.english: It's perfect, don't ask for any more.

subtitles.original: STOP!
subtitles.english: STOP!

subtitles.original: SIT DOWN!
subtitles.english: SIT DOWN!

subtitles.original: SOFT SOFT
subtitles.english: SOFT SOFT

subtitles.original: SIT DOWN!
subtitles.english: SIT DOWN!

subtitles.original: SOFT SOFT
subtitles.english: SOFT SOFT

subtitles.original: SIT DOWN!
subtitles.english: SIT DOWN!

subtitles.english: NO WAY, because I'm a wolf.

subtitles.english: NO WHAT? That Little Red Riding Hood.

subtitles.original: TAKE ME 限界地帯に突入
subtitles.english: TAKE ME, entering the limit zone.

subtitles.original: 甘くなくても溶けていくのさ
subtitles.english: Even if it's not sweet, I'll melt away.

subtitles.original: ONE MORE TIME ARE YOU READY?
subtitles.english: ONE MORE TIME ARE YOU READY?

subtitles.original: プラトニックな プラトニックな エンドレス・ラブ
subtitles.english: Platonic, platonic endless love.

subtitles.original: 触れないで 抱き合って テンダネス・ラブ
subtitles.english: Don't touch me, hold me tight, tenderness love.

subtitles.original: ツミサケ GIVE ME MORE (GIVE ME MORE) ドキドキして致死量
subtitles.english: Shout of sin, GIVE ME MORE (GIVE ME MORE), pounding heart, a lethal dose.

subtitles.original: だから BE QUIET (QUIET) QUIET (QUIET) 見つめ合っているだけ
subtitles.english: So BE QUIET (QUIET) QUIET (QUIET), we're just staring at each other.

subtitles.original: それだけが PLATONIC PLATONIC
subtitles.english: That alone is PLATONIC PLATONIC.

subtitles.original: 二人の愛のパルス
subtitles.english: The pulse of our love.

subtitles.original: 関節的 ありえない I LOVE YOU
subtitles.english: Indirectly, an impossible I LOVE YOU.
